answers.answer: Well I don't know from personal experience but my son's pediatrician has shared that she had a c-section with all 4 of her kids. I needed an emergency c-section with my son but hoping for a vbac with my daughter.

Im on baby #4 and he will be my fourth c-section. The only reason my docs would suggest i geet my tubes tied is the difficulties I have carrying- advanced age, degenerating back, and diabetes- not because of the number of surgeries. Though i do know the risks do climb with each subsequent one.

I was really contemplating a vbac this time. Just to see if I could do it. This will be my third C-section.  The only reason I decided to have another planned C-section is because I want my tubes tied and I didn't want to go through a separate surgery or 2 if I required another C-section. I would have loved to try vbac, unfortunately they never gave me the option last time.
